title: VILLAGE / IDIOT barks
description: Lines from our very own: IDIOT... *DOOM* SPI-IIIIIIIIIIIRAL!!!!

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Gotta ride this one out.""
Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Where's my lighter?! Oh, holding i..."
dialogueTree.english: "Where's my lighter?! Oh, holding it again."
dialogueTree.polish: „Gdzie moja zapalniczka?! Och, znów ją trzymam”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Дзе мая запальнічка?! Вой, зноў яе трымаю".

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""I should definitely start thinking..."
dialogueTree.english: "I should definitely start thinking about jogging again."
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Мне дакладна трэба памеркаваць над вяртаннем прабежак".

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Not sensing a lot of concept in th..."
dialogueTree.english: "Not sensing a lot of concept in this."

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Pass it on, Rosie.""
Idiot Doom Spiral: ""But are you *really* cornering the..."
dialogueTree.english: "But are you *really* cornering the market is the question?"
dialogueTree.polish: „Tylko czy *na pewno* masz ten rynek w garści? Oto jest pytanie”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Але ці *сапраўды* ты трымаеш гэты рынак у кулаку? Вось у чым пытанне".

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""Don't sit on it. Keep the hard stu..."
dialogueTree.english: "Don't sit on it. Keep the hard stuff moving."
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Не чакай з мора пагоды. Гарэлка павінна ліцца".

dialogueTree.title: Idiot Doom Spiral: ""It's a jungle out there... and in..."
dialogueTree.english: "It's a jungle out there... and in here."
dialogueTree.polish: „Tam wszędzie jest dżungla... Tu zresztą też”.
